cobalt.title: D&D Beyond Enhanced Importer - Cobalt Cookie Setup
cobalt.instructions: To import content from D&D Beyond, you need to provide your Cobalt cookie. This is used to authenticate with D&D Beyond and access your purchased content.
cobalt.howTo: How to get your Cobalt Cookie:
cobalt.step2: Open your browser's Developer Tools (F12 or Ctrl+Shift+I).
cobalt.step3: Go to the Application or Storage tab.
cobalt.step4: Find "Cookies" in the sidebar and select "https://www.dndbeyond.com".
cobalt.step5: Look for a cookie named "CobaltSession" and copy its value.
cobalt.label: Cobalt Cookie:
cobalt.note: Your Cobalt cookie is only stored locally on your Foundry server and is used solely for API authentication with D&D Beyond. It is never shared with anyone else.
cobalt.validError: Invalid Cobalt cookie. Please check and try again.
